tool.name: PySCENIC AUCell
tool.description: calculates AUCell to find relevant regulons/gene sets
tool.command:
ln -s '${expression_mtx_fname}' expr_mat.loom && ln -s '${signatures_fname}' regulons.tsv &&
pyscenic aucell expr_mat.loom regulons.tsv -o aucell.tsv #if $transpose -t #end if #if $weights -w #end if --num_workers \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} #if $seed --seed '${seed}' #end if #if str($rank_threshold): --rank_threshold '${rank_threshold}' #end if #if $auc_threshold --auc_threshold '${auc_threshold}' #end if #if $nes_threshold --nes_threshold '${nes_threshold}' #end if #if $cell_id_attribute --cell_id_attribute '${cell_id_attribute}' #end if #if $gene_attribute --gene_attribute '${gene_attribute}' #end if $sparse
&& mv aucell.tsv '${output}'

param.name: expression_mtx_fname
param.label: Expression Matrix File
param.help: The file that contains the expression matrix for the single-cell experiment. Supported formats: csv (rows=cells x columns=genes) or loom (rows=genes x columns=cells).

param.name: signatures_fname
param.label: Gene Signatures/Regulons File
param.help: The file that contains the gene signatures (usually the precomputed regulons). Currently only csv/tsv supported, could be extended.

param.name: transpose
param.label: Transpose Expression Matrix
param.help: Transpose the expression matrix if supplied as csv (rows=genes x columns=cells).

param.name: weights
param.label: Use Weights for Recovery Analysis
param.help: Use weights associated with genes in recovery analysis. Relevant when gene signatures are supplied as json format.

param.name: seed
param.label: Seed for Ranking
param.help: Seed for the expression matrix ranking step. The default is to use a random seed.

param.name: rank_threshold
param.label: Rank Threshold
param.help: The rank threshold used for deriving the target genes of an enriched motif (default: 5000).

param.name: auc_threshold
param.label: AUC Threshold
param.help: The threshold used for calculating the AUC of a feature as fraction of ranked genes (default: 0.05).

param.name: nes_threshold
param.label: NES Threshold
param.help: The Normalized Enrichment Score (NES) threshold for finding enriched features (default: 3.0).

param.name: cell_id_attribute
param.label: Cell ID Attribute
param.help: The name of the column attribute that specifies the identifiers of the cells in the loom file.

param.name: gene_attribute
param.label: Gene Attribute
param.help: The name of the row attribute that specifies the gene symbols in the loom file.

param.name: sparse
param.label: Sparse Matrix
param.help: If set, load the expression data as a sparse matrix. Currently applies to the grn inference step only.

data.name: output
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: AUCell scores for regulons or gene sets.

tool.help:
Run PySCENIC aucell command to analyze single-cell gene expression data.
**Input Parameters:**
- **expression_mtx_fname**: The name of the file that contains the expression matrix for the single cell experiment. Two file formats are supported: csv (rows=cells x columns=genes) or loom (rows=genes x columns=cells).
- **signatures_fname**: The name of the file that contains the gene signatures. Three file formats are supported: gmt, yaml, or dat (pickle).
**Options:**
- **-o, --output**: Output file/stream, a matrix of AUC values. Two file formats are supported: csv or loom. If loom file is specified, it will contain the original expression matrix and the calculated AUC values as extra column attributes.
- **-t, --transpose**: Transpose the expression matrix if supplied as csv (rows=genes x columns=cells).
- **-w, --weights**: Use weights associated with genes in recovery analysis. Is only relevant when gene signatures are supplied as json format.
- **--seed**: Seed for the expression matrix ranking step. The default is to use a random seed.
**Motif Enrichment Arguments:**
- **--rank_threshold**: The rank threshold used for deriving the target genes of an enriched motif (default: 5000).
- **--auc_threshold**: The threshold used for calculating the AUC of a feature as fraction of ranked genes (default: 0.05).
- **--nes_threshold**: The Normalized Enrichment Score (NES) threshold for finding enriched features (default: 3.0).
**Loom File Arguments:**
- **--cell_id_attribute**: The name of the column attribute that specifies the identifiers of the cells in the loom file.
- **--gene_attribute**: The name of the row attribute that specifies the gene symbols in the loom file.
- **--sparse**: If set, load the expression data as a sparse matrix. Currently applies to the grn inference step only.
